posts.author: op
posts.text: Title: Apple's new M4 chip benchmarks just leaked.

posts.author: op
posts.text: Seems like a huge leap over the M3, especially on GPU performance.

posts.author: skeptic42
posts.text: Can we trust Geekbench scores though?

posts.author: battery_user
posts.text: Any info on battery life gains?

posts.author: budget_buyer
posts.text: Hoping MacBook Air prices stay the same ðŸ˜…

posts.author: fanboy99
posts.text: M4 Ultra incoming ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥

posts.author: ai_enthusiast
posts.text: Gemini just crushed ChatGPT in math reasoning. Google's back baby!

posts.author: gpt_fan
posts.text: Oh cool, one contrived benchmark and suddenly ChatGPT is obsolete?

posts.author: neutral_mod
posts.text: Guys, let's focus on constructive comparisons.

posts.author: gemini_user
posts.text: I switched last week. Gemini actually *explains* things better in some STEM cases.

posts.author: sarcastic_troll
posts.text: Yeah, and my toaster beat GPT in common sense.

posts.author: student_debt
posts.text: Finally, a new round of student loan forgiveness is here!

posts.author: taxpayer1
posts.text: Awesome. I didnâ€™t go to college, but now I get to pay for yours. Thanks.

posts.author: grad_supporter
posts.text: It's not about freeloading â€” it's about fixing a predatory system.

posts.author: offtopic_bot
posts.text: btw anyone else here use Rocket Money to track loans?

posts.author: historian42
posts.text: We've bailed out banks, airlines, even carmakers. Why not students?

posts.author: vr_dev
posts.text: Just tried Apple Vision Pro. Mixed feelings tbh.

posts.author: apple_fanboy
posts.text: If you can't see the future in this, you're blind.

posts.author: meta_user
posts.text: It's a ski-goggle meme machine. Pass.

posts.author: developerX
posts.text: It's cool tech, but $3499 is way too high unless you're a dev or demo shop.

posts.author: offtopic_andy
posts.text: Can someone explain how this compares to Steam Deck?
